name: Home Blend Coffee Roasters
description:
Supporting Farmers In India & Indonesia Founders Akshay Jaggi & Saumay Khandelwal talk about the origins of Home Blend Coffee Roasters and how they brought Freshly Roasted World Specialty Coffee At Your Doorstep!
Whole Bean Coffee, Ground Coffee, Drip Coffee Bags Easy Pour Single-Serve Pour Overs, Cold Brew Coffee.
Freshly Roasted Specialty Coffee Beans.
Home Blend Coffee Roasters - Freshly Roasted Specialty Grade Coffee.
Pick Your Roast Level & Grind Size.
